an1.296:1.1: “Ekadhammo, bhikkhave, bhavito bahulikato ekantanibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati.
an1.296:1.4: Ayam kho, bhikkhave, ekadhammo bhavito bahulikato ekantanibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati”ti.
an1.297-305:1.1: “Ekadhammo, bhikkhave, bhavito bahulikato ekantanibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati.
an1.297-305:1.3: Dhammanussati …pe… sanghanussati … silanussati … caganussati … devatanussati … anapanassati … maranassati … kayagatasati … upasamanussati.
an1.297-305:1.4: Ayam kho, bhikkhave, ekadhammo bhavito bahulikato ekantanibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati”ti.
